pageContext.claim: “We kept America out of new wars and we're bringing our troops back home. Afghanistan, we're getting very close, we have it down to a very low number. Uh, Iraq, we're almost finished.”
pageContext.analysis: In mid-August, the U.S. forces in Iraq numbered 5,200. Days after Trump made these remarks, officials announced in September that the force in Iraq would be reduced to 3,000 troops.
